title: 1.64环境mod（或真实mod)的bug汇报
author: 所罗门
txt_content:
原本发现这个mod很兴奋来着可是很不幸的发现了不少bug..{:10_527:}

第一个。。物理效果有些时候会坑，比如说有些水不会往旁边流，可是你放个方块啥的就出事了。。水漫金山啊。。

其实这个还是可以接受的，不过第二个就。。

Bug2:如果你用了桶装水，那无论是在哪种水都会变成普通的水桶，而倒出来的也就变成了普通的水。。

更坑爹的是：一旦你使用水桶接水，全地图的水源都会变成普通的水！！{:10_499:}水源系统完全坑了啊！！

http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/2208073-165-enviromine-a-little-bit-of-realism-1111-new-physics-temperature-hydration-and-more/#entry27024280
这个是原作者的帖子，如果有谁有账号就跟作者发帖汇报一下吧，我个人太懒{:10_500:}

不太会用英文的话就用我下面的这段话吧（可能有些语法错误）

I want to report a very important bug(version1.64):
after you use the pail to carry the water (any kind of water), the water in the pail will become pure water, and so does the water in the whole world.
(I am not sure if this is because of my minecraft contains too many mods or there is a bug here, but plz do tell me if this is the problem on my side)

If there is a bug, my personal suggestion is make three new items( duty water pail , cold water pail and sea water pail) to eliminate the bug, and only the pure water can be used to making potion.

FYI: I am a Chinese high school student, so maybe there are some grammar mistakes in my words, plz don't laugh~many thx~
